text: The men's snooker singles tournament at the 1998 Asian Games in Thailand took place from 6 December to 8 December at Land Sports Complex. ==Schedule== All times are Indochina Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text- align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | rowspan=2|Sunday, 6 December 1998 || 09:00 || First round |- | 16:00 || Second round |- | rowspan=2|Monday, 7 December 1998 || 09:00 || Third round |- | 16:00 || Quarterfinals |- | rowspan=2|Tuesday, 8 December 1998 || 09:00 || Semifinals |- | 16:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Finals |} ==Results== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== == References == *Results Category:Cue sports at the 1998 Asian Games
title: Cue sports at the 1998 Asian Games – Snooker singles
